stimulusHtml: Respond to all parts of the question.

features.html:
In answering the question, you should emphasize the line of reasoning that generated your results; it is not enough to list the results of your analysis. Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes.

Interest rates are important in explaining economic activity.

  1. Using a correctly labeled graph of the money market, show how an increase in the income level will affect the nominal interest rate in the short run.

  2. Using a correctly labeled graph of the loanable funds market, show how a decision by households to increase saving for retirement will affect the real market interest rate in the short run.

  3. Suppose that the nominal interest rate has been 6 percent with no expected inflation. If inflation is now expected to be 2 percent, determine the value of each of the following.

    1. The new nominal interest rate

    2. The new real interest rate
